name: Slack
description: Slack bot adapter for OpenPalm. Receives messages via the Slack Events API and routes them through the gateway.

env.name: SLACK_BOT_TOKEN
env.description: OAuth bot token from your Slack app settings

env.name: SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET
env.description: Used to verify that requests come from Slack

env.name: CHANNEL_SLACK_SECRET
env.description: HMAC signing key for gateway communication. Auto-generated if left blank.

name: Ollama
description: Local LLM inference service. Runs open-source language models locally on your machine for OpenPalm integrations.

env.name: OLLAMA_HOST
env.description: Host and port for Ollama API. Set to 0.0.0.0:11434 for network access.

env.name: OLLAMA_MODELS
env.description: Comma-separated list of models to pull at startup (e.g. mistral,neural-chat). Leave empty to start with no models.

env.name: OLLAMA_NUM_GPU
env.description: Number of GPUs to use. Set to 0 to disable GPU acceleration. Leave empty for auto-detection.
